item.description:
Please join us for our regular monthly Meetup and a brief intro to permaculture!

We will learn the basic tenets that define permaculture design. We'll discuss why permaculture design is an important tool for developing sustainable human environments that work with Nature. This will be a basic intro for members who are not familiar with permaculture concepts. There will be several local permaculturist attending!

7:00- Meet and greet and share potluck foods
7:30- Intro to permaculture
8:15- Questions, answers, and discussion
9:00- Wrap up
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the gal that opens the door.
item.name: April Meetup and Intro to Permaculture
